Get 1% value back as Darna Points
on Card spends outside Aldar destinations
Redeem Darna Points instantly
at over 1,200 Aldar destinations
Redeeming made simple
10 Darna Points =  1 upon redemption
Steps to Redeem:
Step 1
Check your Darna Points balance on your Darna app or ENBD X App.
Step 2
Inform the cashier that you want to redeem Darna Points.
Insert your card
into the POS terminal and choose between
ENBD VISA
and
Darna Points
.
Step 3
Select
ENBD VISA
for standard transactions or Darna Points for redemption of your
Darna Points
. For partial redemptions, split the amount into two transactions as needed.
Earn and redeem your Darna Points at participating Darna Partners
